title: The Secret Life of Arabia
lyrics:
[Chorus]
The secret life
Of Arabia
[Refrain]
Secret secrets, never seen
Secret secrets, evergreen
[Verse 1]
I was running at the speed of life
Through morning's thoughts and fantasies
Then I saw your eyes at the cross fades
[Refrain]
Secret secrets, never seen
Secret secrets, evergreen
[Chorus]
The secret life
Of Arabia
[Post-Chorus]
Never here, never seen
Secret life, evergreen
[Chorus]
The secret life
Of Arabia

[Verse 2]
You must see the movie, the sand in my eyes
I walk through a desert song when the heroine dies
[Bridge]
Arabia
Secret, secret
Arabia
Secret
Arabia
Secret, secret
Arabia
Arabia
Secret, secret
Arabia
Arabia
Secret, secret
Arabia
Arabia
Secret, secret
Shhh
Shhh
[Chorus]
The secret life
Of Arabia

[Post-Chorus]
Never here, never seen
Secret life, evergreen
